sqlMap.select: select cm.COUNTRY_MASTER_ID,cm.COUNTRY from cms_country_master cm where cm.status= 1 order by upper(cm.COUNTRY) ASC

select unique cm.country,cm.COUNTRY_MASTER_ID from cms_country_master cm ,RG_COUNTRY_CHECK_MASTER ccm where cm.COUNTRY_MASTER_ID=ccm.country_id
order by upper(cm.COUNTRY) ASC

select unique cm.country,cm.COUNTRY_MASTER_ID from cms_country_master cm where cm.COUNTRY_MASTER_ID not in (select ccm.country_id from RG_COUNTRY_CHECK_MASTER ccm where ccm.status =1) and cm.status= 1 order by upper(cm.COUNTRY) ASC

select unique cm.country,cm.COUNTRY_MASTER_ID from cms_country_master cm where cm.COUNTRY_MASTER_ID in (select icrr.COUNTRY_ID from RG_COUNTRY_ICRR_DATA_MASTER icrr) and cm.status= 1 order by upper(cm.COUNTRY) ASC

select unique cm.country,cm.COUNTRY_MASTER_ID from cms_country_master cm where cm.COUNTRY_MASTER_ID not in (select icrr.COUNTRY_ID from RG_COUNTRY_ICRR_DATA_MASTER icrr where icrr.status =1) and cm.status= 1 order by upper(cm.COUNTRY) ASC

select unique cm.country,cm.COUNTRY_MASTER_ID from cms_country_master cm ,RG_LBR_COUNTRY_MASTER lbrcm where cm.COUNTRY_MASTER_ID = lbrcm.COUNTRY_MASTER_ID and cm.status= 1 order by upper(cm.COUNTRY) ASC

select unique cm.country,cm.COUNTRY_MASTER_ID from cms_country_master cm where cm.COUNTRY_MASTER_ID not in (select lbrcm.COUNTRY_MASTER_ID from RG_LBR_COUNTRY_MASTER lbrcm where lbrcm.status = 1) and cm.status= 1 order by upper(cm.COUNTRY) ASC
select cm.COUNTRY from cms_country_master cm where cm.COUNTRY_MASTER_ID=#id#
